scripts.newversion: version=$(jq '.version' < package.json); version=${version%\"}; version=${version#\"}; IFS='-'; read -ra PARTS <<< "$version"; if [[ ${PARTS[1]} != "alpha" ]]; then echo ${PARTS[1]}; echo "$version is not on an alpha tag, bailing"; exit 1; fi; IFS=' '; alpha=${PARTS[*]: -1}; alpha=$((alpha+1)); VERSION="${PARTS[0]}-alpha-${alpha}"
scripts.bump: version=$(jq '.version' < package.json); version=${version%\"}; version=${version#\"}; IFS='-'; read -ra PARTS <<< "$version"; if [[ ${PARTS[1]} != "alpha" ]]; then echo ${PARTS[1]}; echo "$version is not on an alpha tag, bailing"; exit 1; fi; IFS=' '; alpha=${PARTS[*]: -1}; alpha=$((alpha+1)); VERSION="${PARTS[0]}-alpha-${alpha}"; npm version -m "Bump react-component to version %s" $VERSION
